item.title: 【Singles (lossless)】WAV - Leighton Meester - Somebody to Love (Rare Promo CD)
item.description:
"Somebody to Love" is a song by American actress and singer Leighton Meester featuring Robin Thicke. Written by Meester, Thicke, Mike Caren, Ollie Goldstein, Rico Love and Shahine Ezell, and produced by Caren, the song was released as Meester's debut single on October 14, 2009, by Universal Republic Records.

In 2023, the studio version of the solo mix, performed once by Meester in 2009, leaked in full.

(These files were obtained from another forum and have not been altered or converted by me.)​



1. Somebody to Love (feat. Robin Thicke)
2. Somebody to Love (Solo/Main Version)

Hidden Content:
You must either reply or click 'Like' to see the hidden information contained here.
The MP3 of the solo mix can be found here.​
item.author: JayFantasi
